CustomField.description: Estimated spend on Marketing (Social) Budget for this Event. Populated automatically from related Budget & Expense records but can be overridden if entered directly. Updates to B&E records will overwrite manual field entries though.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Estimated spend on Marketing (Social) Budget for this Event. Populated automatically from related Budget & Expense records but can be overridden if entered directly. Updates to B&E records will overwrite manual field entries though.
CustomField.label: Marketing (Social) Budget
